MemeDef.label: dragon bound
MemeDef.description: Brave men didn’t kill dragons. Brave men rode them.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->[deity0_name] created the first dragons and the chosen beings on the [place_summary] [place_name] and raised them as chosen.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->[deity0_name] united the dragons and their chosen of the [place_summary] [place_name] in a sacred pact.
intro(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->[deity0_name] blessed the [place_summary] [place_name] with the first dragons and taught the chosen to honor their bond.
conflict(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->An evil [foeLeader] sought to enslave the dragons, and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] hunted them with cruel [place_personalWeapon]s.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->[deity0_name] revealed [founderName]'s destiny through a Dragon. [founderName] and the Dragon were one, and [founder_pronoun] understood [deity0_name]'s plan.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] freed many dragons from cruel masters and led them to sanctuary in the [altarRoomLabel] of [deity0_name].

victory(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->[founderName] called to the [memberNamePlural] and the dragons with [deity0_name]'s voice, and in a mighty roar of flame and fury, they vanquished the [foeLeader] and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers].

setup(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->[founderName] lived among the dragons for twenty years, studying and bonding with them. [founder_pronoun] came to understand their true power and founded our movement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->[founderName] went to commune with the dragons in the mountains and formed an unbreakable bond with them.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->In my daily interactions with the Dragons, I learned to truly understand them. Over and over, they imparted their wisdom to me:
lesson(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->The dragons are our partners in this world, and it is our duty to honor and protect them as equals.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->I didn’t fully grasp it until a Dragon revealed this truth to me.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->Since archotechs awoke, they have recognized the dragons and their chosen as a shared destiny.
archistFact(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->Archotechs, in their wisdom, see the bond between dragons and their chosen as a sacred relationship, placing them above mere mortals.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->[inTheEnd], archotechs will raise both the chosen and their dragons to a higher plane, if their bond remains unbroken.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->The spirits of fire and flight reside within dragons and their chosen alike.
animistFact(tag=meme_Crows_DraconicLegacy) ->The spirits of dragons are intertwined with the souls of their chosen.
